backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, orders, leads, products, file references, and Stripe/config state with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text index of frontend files with brief descriptions of their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry defining global design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme provider, and global layout with TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first-time users to submit name, email, and phone and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth gate that requires Internet Identity login before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/chatbot/chatbotS: Defines chatbot state machine, input processor, budget parsing, and package suggestion logic.
frontend/src/components/chatbot/ChatbotW: Interactive floating chatbot widget managing conversation state, user messages, and lead submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders site footer with navigation links, branding, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Navigation header with authentication handling, responsive mobile menu, and identity management.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout combining header, footer, routed content, and the chatbot widget.
frontend/src/components/payments/ManualP: Displays manual payment number with copy-to-clipboard and supported payment methods.
frontend/src/components/trial/FreeTrialC: Card for claiming or showing status of a free trial, triggering an upgrade modal when claimed.
frontend/src/components/trial/UpgradePro: Modal prompting users to upgrade after claiming the free trial, with navigation to pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity, handling auth client creation, identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and description meta tag when the page loads or dependencies change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, dashboard data, leads, products, orders, and Stripe config.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Creates Stripe checkout sessions and retrieves session status using backend actor mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, CSS variables, typography, and base theme settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with profile info, orders, leads, free trial status, and triggers profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/funnel/FunnelLandingP: Landing page promoting fast website delivery with a call to claim a free demo.
frontend/src/pages/funnel/LeadCapturePag: Form page collecting lead details and submitting them before redirecting to a thank-you page.
frontend/src/pages/funnel/ThankYouPage.t: Confirms successful lead submission and offers navigation to pricing or home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero section, navigation actions, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/legal/PrivacyPolicyPa: Renders the Privacy Policy page with static policy sections and sets page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/legal/RefundPolicyPag: Displays the refund policy with highlighted noâ€‘refund notice and structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/legal/TermsPage.tsx: Shows the Terms & Conditions page outlining services, payment, delivery, and rights.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated order submission form supporting package selection, notes, and payment method handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with retry and home navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a payment success confirmation with links to the dashboard or home.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Renders a filterable portfolio of design items with options to order similar designs.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Provides pricing plans and handles Stripe checkout or trial claiming depending on user state.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists available design services with features, prices, and order actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and session parameters for navigation state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, plugins, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, images, and known issues for the PixelNova build.
